img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy landscape. Two characters are engaged in combat; one character is airborne, executing a kick towards the other character who is lying on the ground. The character on the ground appears to be holding a staff or weapon. Various icons and a health bar labeled "Non-Able" are visible on the screen, indicating gameplay elements such as abilities or items. The snowy environment is detailed with patches of grass and trees in the background.
